info.title: Build Blocks
info.author: Poklik
info.details:
3D sandbox game with blocks!
Up to 4 wii remotes supported.
Controls:
   home : show/hide menu,
   A : zoom in/place block,
   B : rotate camera,
   - : remove block,
   + : quick place block (without zooming),
   down : zoom out,
   left/right : select block color,
   2 : screenshot (with GUI),
   up : toggle debug messages (and FPS counter).
